_header: Read this oft but read it soft
_description: A commendation to the reader — two couplets preceding an extract from Rolle’s Form of Living

BodDou302.Transcription:
Rede thys oft butt rede hit sofftAnd whatt þou redust
                    forȝeete noȝtFor here þe soth þou maght seWhat
                    fruyte comeþ of þy body
